name: Slasher VR
summary: Set in the world of the horror series Slasher, the Slasher VR choose-your-own-adventure experience places you in the creepy town of Waterbury as an undercover reporter investigating The Executioner’s horrific series of murders. As the body count rises, it’s up to you to bring a fresh pair of eyes to the case, but you soon discover that you’re unwelcome by the local citizens…and the killer isn’t far behind.
